block.p: ROBERTS-Ethel. Formerly of New York City and Boca Raton, FL. Beloved wife of the late Ellis, devoted mother of Joan Honig and Roger Roberts, dear sister of Florence Siegal, and the late Sol Ravitz, loving grandmother of Kevin and Michael Honig, and Adam Roberts. Services at Sanctuary of Abraham and Sarah at Cedar Park Cemetery, Paramus, NJ, on Thursday at 10 A.M. For further info call Gutterman-Musicant, Hackensack, NJ at: 1-800-522-0588.
